actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Children, Family, Drugs, Alcohol. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-436.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Children, Family, Drugs and Alcoholism

official_title: A bill to amend the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to administer a Federal demonstration program to coordinate response and strategy within many sectors of local communities for intervention and prevention of domestic violence.
short_title: Domestic Violence Community Initiative Act of 1993

summary.text: Domestic Violence Community Initiative Act of 1993 - Amends the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide grants to nonprofit private organizations to establish local community intervention and domestic violence prevention projects. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Domestic Violence Community Initiative Act of 1993

A bill to amend the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to administer a Federal demonstration program to coordinate response and strategy within many sectors of local communities for intervention and prevention of domestic violence.
